nodes.text: Uralangs were a species that could be found in a zoo on Sarini Island, on the planet Chandrila. They made an "ook" sound. In the year 5 ABY, during a visit to the zoo, Brentin, Temmin, and Norra Wexley witnessed the uralangs, which Brentin laughed at.
Uralangs were mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a 2016 novel by Chuck Wendig.
